Body: i am getting image from gallery and sending to the server.code is working fine but in marshmallow code does not work. image show on imageview but not getting on server.public void pickimage(){        Intent galleryIntent = new Intent(Intent.ACTION_PICK,                android.provider.MediaStore.Images.Media.EXTERNAL_CONTENT_URI);        // Start the Intent        startActivityForResult(galleryIntent, RESULT_LOAD_IMG);    }public void pickimage(){        Intent galleryIntent = new Intent(Intent.ACTION_PICK,                android.provider.MediaStore.Images.Media.EXTERNAL_CONTENT_URI);        // Start the Intent        startActivityForResult(galleryIntent, RESULT_LOAD_IMG);    }
